mapper.select: SELECT T.name,T.pay,T.pay_date,T.scale,jysinfo FROM hub_commerce_co_shareholder T LEFT JOIN hub_commerce_enterprise n ON T .company_name = n. NAME left join hub_dd_tqs_jys h1 on h1.jysmc = t.company_name left join hub_ref_jysinfo h2 on h1.jys = h2.jys where jysinfo ='青金中心' and T.type='1' order by name

SELECT T.name,T.pay,T.pay_date,T.scale,jysinfo FROM hub_commerce_co_shareholder T LEFT JOIN hub_commerce_enterprise n ON T .company_name = n. NAME left join hub_dd_tqs_jys h1 on h1.jysmc = t.company_name left join hub_ref_jysinfo h2 on h1.jys = h2.jys where jysinfo ='联合信用资产' and T.type='1' order by name

SELECT T.name,T.pay,T.pay_date,T.scale,jysinfo FROM hub_commerce_co_shareholder T LEFT JOIN hub_commerce_enterprise n ON T .company_name = n. NAME left join hub_dd_tqs_jys h1 on h1.jysmc = t.company_name left join hub_ref_jysinfo h2 on h1.jys = h2.jys where jysinfo ='青岛文化产权' and T.type='1' order by name
